title: Horimiya S1
synopsis: Two very different people - an academically successful schoolgirl and a quiet loser schoolboy - meet and develop a friendship.

title: Demon Slayer S1
synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

title: My Hero Academia S1
synopsis: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.

title: 7 Deadly Sins S1
synopsis: The story of the Seven Deadly Sins, a group of warriors who were wrongly accused of a crime they didn't commit and went on a quest to vindicate themselves.

title: Erased
synopsis: 29-year-old Satoru Fujinuma is sent back in time 18 years to prevent the events leading to his mother's death, which began with a series of kidnappings while he was in 5th grade.
